data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Quneitra that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quneitra, Syria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Quneitra
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 524 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 36,200 people living in Quneitra, Syria. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Quneitra words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, North Iraqi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 36,200 souls in Quneitra and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Quneitra.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quneitra, Syria has a population of 36,200.

We estimate Quneitra has 69 people who might know Jesus, 2,002 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 34,129 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 524 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 34,129 lost people in  Quneitra, Syria have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
